name: @thenewdynamic/gohugo-theme-ananke
description: Ananke: A theme for Hugo Sites
author: Bud Parr (https://github.com/budparr)

server.command: cd exampleSite; rm -rf public; hugo server -D -E -F --environment gargulus --navigateToChanged --disableFastRender --forceSyncStatic --logLevel debug --tlsAuto --printI18nWarnings --printMemoryUsage --printPathWarnings --printUnusedTemplates --templateMetrics --templateMetricsHints 2>&1 | tee -a hugo.log

server:fail.command: cd exampleSite; rm -rf public; hugo server -D -E -F --environment gargulus --navigateToChanged --disableFastRender --forceSyncStatic --logLevel debug --tlsAuto --panicOnWarning --printI18nWarnings --printMemoryUsage --printPathWarnings --printUnusedTemplates --templateMetrics --templateMetricsHints 2>&1 | tee -a hugo.log
